channel.title: [MoparScapeSponsored]Bobo2Worlds[Eco/PvP]
channel.description:
[center]BoboPvP is Back! AND WE'VE GOTTEN BETTER Webclient, Forums, Dl Client
Start Here - http://www.bobopvp.com/forums/ _______________________________________
[size=20pt]Do You Want An Economy?[/size]
webclient- [url=http://www.Bobopvp.com/eco/]www.Bobopvp.com/eco/[/url] dlc- [url=http://goo.gl/J71Cf]http://goo.gl/J71Cf[/url] __________________________________________
[size=20pt]Or DO You Want A Pk Eco![/size]
[b]In the economy world players teleports and pvm has been removed. You just gear up and pk for PvP and Pk level earned level points along with the PvP Titles![/b]
[IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Titles.png[/img]
Webclient - [url=http://www.Bobopvp.com/Pk]www.Bobopvp.com/Pk[/url]
Download Client - [url=http://goo.gl/YGbjo]http://goo.gl/YGbjo[/url]
____________________________________________
RsWebclients Link(Not Recommended) - http://www.rswebclients.com/info/BoboPvP
Features: -Perfect Switching for Hybrids -Veng -Barrage -634 Graphics/Animations/Items -PvP Armor/Curses released -New F-Keys -Unique features -Stable Economy -No dupes -24/7 vps hosted -Constant Updates -Great Staff Team -634 graphics -Great Donator Benefits -Chaotic Weapons -Great Rushing System! -Full Drops AND RANDOM PvP Drops too! -Pking Level! -Clue Scrolls and great rewards! -Turmoil/Soul Split, with proper effects -Highscores System Interfaces! -100% drop party room -Spirit shields with proper effects, i.e: -Divine: Always reduces 30% of damage, taking 5% of the 30% from your -Prayer. -Elysian: 70% chance of reducing 25% damage taken. -Perfect xlogging fix -Duel arena -Godwars bosses -Webclient -Unique donor system -Slayer points -Perfect revamped banking -Revamped PvP System -Perfect, revamped shopping -Perfect private messaging -All private chat options work properly -Pest control -Slayer points -All skillcape emotes work -Perfect combat -Amazing pking -Buy 50, sell 50 -No rollbacks -Pest control -Donator crown changing system -All skills are trainable -Pk points and pk point store. -All PvP Items and Armors. (Morrigans, Vesta, Statius, and Zuriels) -Overloads -Restore Special -Primal armour + weapons -Promethium Armor + weapons -Korasi's Sword -Hand cannon -Chaotic Shield -Dragon Defender
[size=10pt]Custom Bank Boss[/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/CustomBankBoss.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Pking Level![/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Levels.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Players waiting to make you sit![/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Players.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Teleport interfaces[Eco world][/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Problemtobefixed-1.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Donator Zone[Donations accepted one week monthly][/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/DonorZone.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Commands![/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/JoinToday.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Come Pk![/size] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/sf-1.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: [MoparScapeSponsored]Bobo2Worlds[Eco/PvP]
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“djzone, post:3, topic:492317”][quote author=CoderOops link=topic=610547.msg4235529#msg4235529 date=1361538895]
Lol let’s put facts straight…
When you switch items fast, it does drop sometimes items, what you wanna put on (fail hybrid)
Combat system is messed up.
I can’t see anything, what you did add…
Barrows or gwd ain’t working (I know, because you just leeched it.)

Please take it down… You’re pathetic.
[/quote]
Item drop fixed. [This was due to the bottom right corner of the items having a drop option.
Combat system is perfectly redone. Prayerbook error fixed.
If you logged in You’d see everything ive done.
GWD working now.

You need to find somewhere else to build up your post count.[/quote]

He comes back!

OT: Good luck with this project! You might want to organize your quest tab a little bit.

Read full topic
